name: TheCompenDMPodcast
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Subscribe for bite-sized podcasts helping to explain the mechanics and game play of the popular table top role playing game Dungeons and Dragons. This resource is designed to demystify the 1000 pages of handbooks so you can learn quicker and start playing sooner.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
